title: Ancient Second Temple Workshop Uncovered on Mount Scopus After Antiquities Raid
description: A large Second Temple–era stone workshop that supplied Jerusalem’s Jewish population some 2,000 years ago has been uncovered on the eastern slopes of Mount Scopus, the Israel Antiquities Authority (IAA) announced Monday.The post Ancient Second Temple Workshop Uncovered on Mount Scopus After Antiquities Raid appeared first on Worthy Christian News.

title: Exhibition 'Discovering Ancient Egypt' now extended until 3 May 2026
description: The exhibition ‘Discovering Ancient Egypt’ at the Rijksmuseum van Oudheden in Leiden (the Dutch National Museum of Antiquities) has been extended until 3 May 2026 due to strong public demand. Following a successful international tour that drew more than 1.5 million visitors, the exhibition continues to draw enthusiastic audiences in the Netherlands. Visitors now have an extra seven weeks to explore ‘Discovering Ancient Egypt’, an immersive display of hundreds of objects from the museum’s celebrated collection. Highlights include beautifully painted coffins and statues, exquisite jewellery, papyrus fragments and animal mummies, complemented by key loans from Dutch and international museums. Together, these extraordinary objects bring the life, religion and culture of ancient Egypt vividly to life, enriched by the latest discoveries and research. The museum

title: Ancient Traditions Blaze Anew: 18th Central Plains Folk Culture Festival Opens in Xun County
description: XUN COUNTY, Henan Province - Lanterns illuminated millennium-old walls Saturday evening as the 18th Central Plains (Hebi) Folk Culture Festival opened in Xun County, transforming this national historical city into a vibrant stage where ancient heritage meets modern celebration.Image: https://www.globalnewslines.com/uploads/2026/02/f49bfc48f6248f374bb7b62d8b4ad069.jpgUnder
